Job DescriptionOur Finance team brings together our financial perspectives into our overall strategic and tactical decision making. We use state-of-the-art techniques for financial analysis, planning, accounting, reporting and performance evaluation. This allows the organization to continue advancing medical innovation and improve lives. You will be responsible for FP&A activities with the objective of providing business counterparts with insightful and informative analysis to help driving successfull P&Lresults. You will deep dive into every aspect of the business, to drive improvement and use data to drive the right long term decisions.Job Description :Set-up of all critical Financial Planning & Analysis processes with a lean and innovative approach
Provide decision support to Türkiye Cluster ( (Türkiye, Ukraine and CIS countries) management through and outside of planning cycles, perform forecasting/planning cycles
Establish stakeholder relationships with business partners, commercial teams. Work closely with support functions to align on month-end closing as well
Collaborate closely with regional/global process owners to optimize local processes and deliverables
Continuously focus on process optimization and simplification
Provide ad-hoc support to the Turkey Cluster Finance Director as per need (not limited to Financial Planning & Analysis, also in controlling and accounting)Qualification :Bachelor's degree from related fields
At least 3 years experiences in Financial Planning & Analysis. Preferably in Pharma Industry
Excellent command of English (both written and verbal)
Advanced MS Office knowledge & excellent spreadsheet skills, SAP knowledge is preferable
Strong business partner attitude to support business counterparts
